name: Last In Space (Darenn Keller)
description:
Survive in space, build facilities on planets, kill the zorgs.

The game is still a work in progress, visuals, sounds and balancing are all placeholders But you're very welcome to give feedback and ideas about the game systems and mechanics!
The game is still missing two big things in terms of mechanics :

  • A map (to orient yourself and show you where is the hive).
  • Waves of zorgs attacking you from time to time.
  • Better AIs.

Follow me on itch or twitter to get the future updates!

CONTROLS

Gamepad recommended!

press escape in game to see and modify the controls.

HOW TO PLAY Survive Health Points

When at zero, it's game over. You can lose HP when taking damages from the zorgs but also by suffocation. Build garages to restore HP.

Oxygen

When you have no oxygen left, you start loosing HP (then you die and it's game over). You loose oxygen over time. Build greenhouses to restore oxygen.

Energy

When you have no energy left, you move very slowly (hope you're not chased by a brood). Build nuclear plants to restore energy.

Build Planets

There are different types of planet (colors). Each type has its own facilities that you can build on it. Choose wisely, as you can build only one by planet.

Minerals

You can find minerals floating around in space. With that you can build facilities on planets. You can get more minerals by building mines.

Fight

The zorgs are your enemies. The zorg Hive infests planets with nests. Brood and Spiters are born in nests. The more nests, the harder. Kill the Hive to win the game.

Ammo

I'm sure you got it, but just in case, you can't shoot if you have no ammo. Build factories to restore your ammo.

Barracks

This facility builds space robots to defend the planet. You can also order them to attack the hive by pressing A when flying over the barracks.
